Text:
Great movie, one of my absolute favorites. 

Though video quality is bad due to the vhs, it is still one of the few ww2 movies which one must definitely watch.

Thank you!!

Uzair

Good made for TV movie starring Jim Belushi.  It's a remake of an older film.  Bummer that the source was VHS, resulting in washed out colors and poor detail, but it's definitely better than nothing.  Hope a DVD rip makes it's way online someday.
Great... THX soo much.. I have been looking fore this movie fore years. :-) Thumbs up
